alpha = 0.05

    print('U Statistic: ', stat)
    print('P-value: ', p_value)
    print('Reject H0, Distributions are not equal.')
else:
    print('U Statistic: ', stat)
    print('P-value: ', p_value)
    print('Fail to Reject H0, Distributions are equal.')
